
   Streams    |  length  |  k |  d  | drift speed*         | bulunan drift sayisi
   -----------|----------|----|-----|----------------------|
1  Drifted 1  |  50.000  | 10 | 50  | 100                  | 186 (data round edildi noktadan sonra 6 basamak olana kadar) / 4 basamak 188 drift (synthesised-drifted1-rounded.csv)
2  Drifted 3  |  50.000  | 10 | 100 | 100                  |
3  Drifted 2  |  50.000  | 10 | 10  | 100                  | 127 (data round edilmedi. synthesised-drifted3.csv)
4  Drifted 4  |  50.000  | 20 | 50  | 100                  |
5  Drifted 5  |  50.000  | 4  | 50  | 100                  |
6  Drifted 6  |  50.000  | 10 | 50  | 40   (high speed)    |
7  Drifted 7  |  50.000  | 10 | 50  | 400  (low speed)     |
8  Stable  8  |  50.000  | 10 | 50  | 99999 (no drift)     |
9  Abrupt  9  |  50.000  | 10 | 50  | abrupt/recurring (every ~4500 instances) |


*: (Kernels move a predefined distance of 0.01 every speed points.) 





Stream1 datasetinde noktadan sonra 6 basamak bırakıldı. Toplam drift sayısı 186. (271 sn)
Bulunan driftlerin sample sayıları: 190, 440, 810, 1120, 1750, 2080, 2400, 2620, 2840, 3170, 3470, 3590, 3950, 4290, 4470, 4590, 4750, 5090, 5250, 5390, 5820, 6150, 6460, 6650, 6770, 6900, 7100, 7290, 7410, 7590, 7700, 7810, 7940, 8040, 8420, 8800, 9280, 9550, 9770, 10020, 10160, 10400, 10600, 10800, 11330, 11710, 11890, 12080, 12190, 12470, 12760, 12960, 13100, 13510, 13620, 13780, 13890, 14180, 14320, 14560, 14860, 14970, 15120, 15400, 15570, 16020, 16520, 16690, 17100, 17210, 17500, 17720, 17880, 17990, 18090, 18230, 18340, 18470, 18800, 19410, 19510, 19710, 20020, 20210, 20440, 20680, 21020, 21160, 21720, 21960, 22420, 22580, 22730, 22890, 23230, 23540, 23670, 23960, 24110, 24290, 24420, 24570, 24730, 25150, 25600, 25720, 26050, 26190, 26370, 26500, 26920, 27260, 27710, 27810, 28370, 28600, 28870, 29200, 29330, 29440, 29720, 30000, 31360, 31460, 31610, 31750, 31980, 32470, 32590, 33230, 33590, 33720, 33920, 34140, 34240, 34440, 35080, 35180, 35410, 35560, 35710, 35830, 36020, 36170, 36930, 37100, 37320, 37670, 37930, 38050, 38710, 38850, 39650, 39800, 40420, 40620, 41220, 41570, 41730, 42040, 42260, 42500, 42800, 43350, 43610, 43780, 43970, 44210, 44380, 44790, 45030, 45180, 46010, 46250, 46610, 46860, 46960, 47630, 47760, 48070, 48170, 48660, 49260, 49390, 49530, 49650


Stream3 datasetinde toplam 127 drift bulundu. ( 99 sn) 
Bulunan driftlerin sample numberı: 180, 510, 620, 1790, 2010, 2330, 2860, 3870, 4110, 4210, 4390, 4570, 5170, 5380, 5630, 5840, 5950, 6360, 6500, 6900, 7120, 7890, 8110, 8330, 8620, 9120, 9390, 9900, 10100, 10250, 10450, 10620, 10900, 11120, 11280, 11540, 12020, 12380, 12510, 13040, 13160, 13470, 13580, 13980, 14520, 15600, 15850, 16640, 17260, 17360, 17480, 17620, 17930, 18410, 18710, 19150, 19290, 19400, 20380, 20780, 21040, 21330, 21510, 21790, 22020, 22130, 22260, 23060, 24090, 24970, 25170, 25520, 25870, 26060, 26800, 28160, 28620, 29250, 29460, 30200, 30630, 31180, 31380, 31500, 31610, 31840, 32940, 33220, 33660, 33960, 34590, 36060, 36420, 36640, 36870, 37950, 38090, 38190, 38430, 38550, 38750, 38960, 39150, 39560, 40390, 41100, 41450, 41740, 42740, 42960, 43600, 44050, 44650, 44810, 45430, 45640, 45740, 46090, 46590, 46920, 47640, 48240, 48340, 48520, 48780, 49700, 49960


Stable datasetinde toplam 193 drift bulundu. (262 sn)
Bulunan driftlerin sample numberı: 250, 560, 730, 970, 1220, 1770, 2010, 2210, 2540, 2690, 2800, 3010, 3220, 3470, 3580, 3710, 3980, 4440, 4720, 4960, 5280, 5440, 5690, 5940, 6780, 7130, 7280, 7430, 7630, 7740, 7850, 8110, 8230, 8380, 8840, 8990, 9200, 9700, 9870, 10050, 10250, 10510, 10620, 11040, 11170, 11430, 11580, 12020, 12250, 12790, 12920, 13040, 13150, 13640, 13870, 14030, 14680, 14790, 14910, 15070, 15450, 15840, 15940, 16090, 16260, 16550, 17100, 17210, 17510, 17780, 18010, 18320, 18570, 18800, 19120, 20120, 20440, 20560, 20780, 20910, 21230, 21450, 21770, 22160, 22310, 22490, 22800, 23380, 23480, 23610, 23890, 24050, 24150, 24530, 24640, 24750, 25030, 25190, 25380, 25590, 25690, 26000, 26150, 26830, 26960, 27090, 27310, 27680, 27900, 28080, 28340, 28700, 29110, 29230, 29360, 29500, 29670, 29770, 29940, 30170, 30390, 30530, 30750, 31390, 31520, 31760, 31940, 32130, 32410, 32660, 32760, 32960, 33140, 33280, 33470, 33650, 33910, 34410, 34580, 34690, 34870, 35190, 35290, 35640, 35910, 36060, 36600, 36760, 36930, 37320, 37570, 37990, 38110, 38280, 38560, 39000, 39450, 39580, 39770, 40120, 40280, 40890, 41070, 41700, 41880, 42060, 42750, 43180, 43410, 43680, 43910, 44240, 44960, 45550, 45660, 45930, 46090, 46330, 46470, 46610, 46890, 47220, 47610, 48010, 48290, 48410, 48630, 48780, 48940, 49070, 49280, 49590, 49730
















Sample R code : 

library(rJava)
library(proxy)
library(stream)
library(streamMOA)

# drifted stream :
# create another stream dataset with drift
the_k = 10
the_d = 50
the_r = 0.02
the_noise = 0
the_speed = 100
the_name = "driftedS1"
the_cnt = 50000

stream <- DSD_RandomRBFGeneratorEvents(k=the_k, d=the_d, numClusterRange=the_k, kernelRadius=the_r, noiseLevel=the_noise, speed=the_speed)
saveDSC(stream, paste(the_name, ".dsc", sep = ""))
mypoints = get_points(stream, the_cnt, class=TRUE)
write.table(mypoints, paste(the_name, ".txt", sep = ""), row.names = FALSE, col.names = FALSE, sep = ' ')
